p: Rosin ester containing poly(α-azide-ε-caprolactone) can be prepared from rosin propargyl ester, α-chloro-ε-caprolactone and sodium azide according to Scheme 80, and using such separation methods as centrifugation and vacuum drying [ 147]. This biodegradable copolymer shows properties similar to poly(methyl acrylate) [ 263]. Similar polymers with quaternary ammonium groups showing antimicrobial properties can be also prepared [ 264].
